themes: clarity and consistency in budget categories
key_phrases: It takes a LOT of skill and time to get/manage one of these grants
What do you really need to know from us?
match the budget category titles from the application to the final report
they do not always match and it's confusing and unhelpful
barriers_identified: complexity of application and reporting processes
requirement for high skill and time to manage grants
confusing and inconsistent budget category titles
solutions_proposed: simplify the reporting process (not just by reducing word counts)
offer general operating grants in larger programs
match budget category titles between application and final report
